sentences.en: The House bill would authorize the secretary of health and human services to negotiate drug prices in Medicare and Medicaid.
sentences.cn: 众议院的法案将授权卫生与公众服务部部长就医疗保险和医疗补助计划中的药品价格进行协商。

sentences.en: Some doctors won't accept Medicaid patients.
sentences.cn: 一些医生不接待医疗补助署的病人。

sentences.en: For her medical care, the family was forced to turn to Medicaid.
sentences.cn: 为了她的医疗，家人被迫求助于医疗补助署。
